name: Chess Stars - Play Online
description:
Chess Stars is the ultimate social chess app for everyone. Play with your friends and millions of players worldwide.

FEATURES
- Quick Matches with players in real time
- Play Friends and players around the world
- Chat with other players
- Play Computer at 10 difficulty levels
- Track your performance
- Beautiful themes and chess sets
- Small app size
- Optimized for long lasting battery

-----------------------------------------------------------------

Also available in the app:

Chess Stars Premium Subscription
No ads, All themes unlocked, and much more!

Free Trial Period: 3 Days
Subscription Price: $4.99 USD
Subscription Duration: Monthly

**TERMS & DETAILS**

Cancel subscription any time. Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period by going to your Account Settings after purchase. Payment will be charged to iTunes account at confirmation of purchase. Any unused portion of free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when you purchase a subscription.

* Prices may vary by location.

Terms of Use: https://huuugegames.com/privacy-policy/
Privacy Policy: https://huuugegames.com/terms-of-use

-----------------------------------------------------------------

For support, please contact us at chess-stars@huuugegames.com

To stay updated about new features, upcoming changes and all things at Chess Stars, follow us on social media.

Facebook: www.facebook.com/chessstarapp
Twitter: www.twitter.com/chessstarapp
